  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class TestEasyKillBotFiring
extends robocode.control.testing.RobotTestBed
    This tests for variability in bullet power administered by the robot EasyKillBot.
    Author:
    Philip Johnson

      • onTurnEnded

        public void onTurnEnded(robocode.control.events.TurnEndedEvent event)
        At the end of each turn, checks the power of all bullets moving across the battlefield. Checks to see if there is any variability in bullet power, proving that EasyKillBot is using proportional firing based on distance of detected enemy robot.
        Specified by:
        onTurnEnded in interface robocode.control.events.IBattleListener
        Overrides:
        onTurnEnded in class robocode.control.testing.RobotTestBed
        Parameters:
        event - Info about the current state of the battle.
